content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 add a pop of colour to your wardrobe with this quick and easy crochet bandana made with classic granny squares it s perfect for beginners and a great way to use up leftover yarn wear it around your neck for a cosy winter look tie it around your head for a cottage core vibe or style it however you like this versatile accessory is fun to make and adds a handmade touch to any outfit the elements granny square bandana is one of the patterns featured in the elements crochet ebook a collection of fun quick and easy projects designed in the same cheerful granny square style alongside the bandana the ebook also includes a coordinating cowl beanie and gloves perfect for creating a full matching set each pattern is beginner-friendly uses bright stash-busting colours and makes it easy to add a handmade touch to your wardrobe or gift a loved one
